title: Elqueeness - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Seinen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Adventurers   Androgynous Characters   Angels   Aristocracy   Carefree Protagonist   Demons   Doting Parents   Dragons   Elemental Magic   Fantasy World   Friendship   Genderless Protagonist   Godly Powers   Gods   Hiding True Abilities   Humanoid Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Reincarnated in Another World   Secret Identity   Special Abilities   Spirits   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Tragic Past
author: 이환
description:
He died as a human, only to be told his birth was a mistake.

He was supposed to be born as the Elqueeness, the Water Spirit King. And now, they will fix that mistake and he will be reborn to his rightful destiny. But wait, there are still many problems concerning this Spirit King who doesn’t know how to do anything!>
